title: The Transmigrated Senior Martial Brother - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Age Regression   Beasts   Black Belly   Clingy Lover   Cold Protagonist   Cultivation   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Hiding True Identity   Kuudere   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Naive Protagonist   Orphans   Poisons   Possession   Possessive Characters   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Yandere   Younger Love Interests
author: Bao Dian   Canonical Text   宝典
description:
In a stallion novel there is always a Senior Martial Brother like this:

In the early stages of the novel, his innate talent is high, his cultivation is good, his appearance is handsome, and he has an intelligent, cute younger Martial Sister as a fiancée.

In the middle stages of the novel, he is caught unprepared and defeated by a young disciple (the protagonist) in the sect who’s hardly remarkable at all. From then on, he falls from his godly altar and loses his brilliance. Even his young Martial Sister leaves him for someone else.

In the late stages of the novel, he continues to blackened, going down the Demonic Path and becoming the major villainous boss. However, the protagonist still ruthlessly defeats him and his soul is eternally sealed.

Once Qin Mo opened his eyes, he discovered that he had become this Senior Martial Brother.>
